title: Prompt Stack - Open Source - AI Prompts and code generation rules for Prompt Engineering
description: Prompt Stack is an open-source, searchable collection of AI prompts and code generation rules for prompt engineering, featuring Cursor rules, Bolt.new, Loveable, Windsurf, and Trae; designed to streamline developer workflows.
platform: Prompt Stack is a community-driven platform for developers to discover, share, and manage AI prompts and code generation rules.
goal: To help developers leverage AI tools more effectively by providing a curated collection of prompts that enhance productivity and code quality.

features.searchable_directory: Quickly find AI prompts and code-gen rules tailored to your needs.
features.prompt_rating_system: Rate and discover top prompts in the directory.
features.category_organization: Prompts are organized into clear, functional categories.
features.github_integration: Automatically link GitHub or social profiles submitted with prompts.
features.carbon_copy_view: View and copy prompts in a Carbon-style editor window.
features.readme_support: Find and submit README examples for AI and code-gen projects.
features.cursor_rules: Find and submit Cursor rules for AI and code-gen projects.
features.seo_optimized: AI tool lists, prompt engineering, and metadata for better discoverability.
